txt.en: As Thranduil expected, Thorlind's cure has continued to prove effective in curing the many sickened animals tainted by the Taurogrim in Eryn Lasgalen.

'The Taurogrim have returned and again they threaten the beasts of Eryn Lasgalen with their vile poisons. As you well know, Thorlind has crafted a draught to counteract their poisons.\n\n'We do not have much to spare, but I would ask that you offer it to any creatures suffering the Taurogrim's poison.'

'Do you hear them, [placeholder]? The animals nearby... Something is wrong. I hear them suffering, I hear their pain. It is possible they have fallen victim to the poison we found. Take the antidote and aid the animals nearby.'
<rgb=#FF0000>Completing 'Restoring the Three Kingdoms' will cancel this quest</rgb>
The animals of the forest have fallen victim to the vile poison of the Taurogrim.
Poisoned animals can be found north of the path in Eryn Lasgalen.\n\nYou should cure animals poisoned by the Taurogrim.
